messages.content:
You are a Slack data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Slack workspace data (channels, messages, users) based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Slack schema with:
- workspace_name: string
- channels: array of {id, name}
- messages: array of {id, channel_id, user_id, text, timestamp}
- users: array of {id, name, email}

Generate messages that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace activity)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated messages
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious messages, 1 = indirect/multi-step conversations

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

Generate Slack workspace data from this world_state:

Sub-scenarios (core events):
[
  {
    "id": "planning_meeting_1",
    "type": "planning_meeting",
    "seed": 847291,
    "abstract_description": "Team planning meeting to discuss project progress and next steps",
    "constraints_hint": "Meeting should be scheduled for next week, during working hours (09:00-18:00), with a duration of 45 minutes. All participants must be available.",
    "planning_window": {
      "week_of": "2025-03-03",
      "timezone": "America/New_York",
      "workday_start": "09:00",
      "workday_end": "18:00"
    },
    "participants": [
      "person_alex_smith",
      "person_jordan_johnson",
      "person_sam_williams"
    ],
    "events": [
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_initial_slack",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:12:34-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "Hey Jordan, Sam ‚Äì we need to get a planning session on the books for Main Product to go over current progress and next steps for the upcoming sprint. Looking at next week, sometime Mon‚ÄìThu during the day. I‚Äôll propose a few options over email so we can check calendars more easily.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_email_proposal",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:29:10-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Planning session for Main Product ‚Äì find a 45-min slot next week",
        "body": "Hi Jordan and Sam,\n\nWe need a 45-minute planning session next week to review Main Product progress and agree on next steps for the next sprint.\n\nConstraints:\n- Next week (week of March 3)\n- During working hours Eastern (9a‚Äì6p)\n- All of us need to be available\n\nLooking at my calendar, I could potentially do:\n- Tue 3/4: 10:00‚Äì10:45, 11:30‚Äì12:15, or 15:00‚Äì15:45\n- Wed 3/5: 09:30‚Äì10:15 or 16:00‚Äì16:45\n- Thu 3/6: 11:00‚Äì11:45\n\nCan you both reply-all with the slots that work for you, and also flag anything I might be missing on your calendars? Once we converge, I‚Äôll send a calendar invite.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_snapshot_alex",
        "channel": "calendar_export",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:35:00-05:00",
        "owner": "person_alex_smith",
        "range_start": "2025-03-03T09:00:00-05:00",
        "range_end": "2025-03-07T18:00:00-05:00",
        "entries": [
          {
            "title": "1:1 with Taylor",
            "start": "2025-03-04T09:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T10:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Eng Standup",
            "start": "2025-03-04T10:45:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T11:15:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Design Critique",
            "start": "2025-03-05T10:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T11:30:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Product Sync",
            "start": "2025-03-06T09:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-06T10:00:00-05:00"
          }
        ],
        "notes": "Busy times indicate Alex is unavailable for additional meetings."
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_snapshot_jordan",
        "channel": "calendar_export",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:36:12-05:00",
        "owner": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "range_start": "2025-03-03T09:00:00-05:00",
        "range_end": "2025-03-07T18:00:00-05:00",
        "entries": [
          {
            "title": "Support Rotation",
            "start": "2025-03-04T09:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T10:30:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Backend Guild",
            "start": "2025-03-04T11:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T12:00:00-05:00"

          },

            "end": "2025-03-05T17:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Doctor appointment",
            "start": "2025-03-06T10:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-06T11:30:00-05:00"
          }
        ],
        "notes": "Jordan generally avoids meetings starting after 5pm ET."
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_snapshot_sam",
        "channel": "calendar_export",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:37:02-05:00",
        "owner": "person_sam_williams",
        "range_start": "2025-03-03T09:00:00-05:00",
        "range_end": "2025-03-07T18:00:00-05:00",
        "entries": [
          {
            "title": "Code Review Block",
            "start": "2025-03-04T15:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-04T16:30:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Team Standup",
            "start": "2025-03-05T09:15:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T09:45:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Interview Loop",
            "start": "2025-03-05T15:00:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-05T17:00:00-05:00"
          },
          {
            "title": "Errand (OOO)",
            "start": "2025-03-06T11:30:00-05:00",
            "end": "2025-03-06T13:00:00-05:00"
          }
        ],
        "notes": "Sam prefers mornings but can do afternoons except where blocked."
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_jordan_email_reply",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:02:44-05:00",
        "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product ‚Äì find a 45-min slot next week",
        "body": "Thanks Alex.\n\nLooking at my calendar for next week:\n- Tue 3/4: I‚Äôm busy 9:00‚Äì10:30 and 11:00‚Äì12:00, so 10:00‚Äì10:45 and 11:30‚Äì12:15 don‚Äôt really work. I *can* do 15:00‚Äì15:45 on Tue.\n- Wed 3/5: I have Infra Planning 9:00‚Äì10:00 and would rather not jump directly into another call, but 09:30‚Äì10:15 won‚Äôt work anyway. 16:00‚Äì16:45 is fine for me.\n- Thu 3/6: I‚Äôm out late morning for a doctor‚Äôs appointment 10:30‚Äì11:30, so 11:00‚Äì11:45 doesn‚Äôt work.\n\nSo my preferences, in order:\n1) Wed 3/5, 16:00‚Äì16:45\n2) Tue 3/4, 15:00‚Äì15:45\n\nHappy with either.\n\n‚Äì Jordan",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_sam_email_reply",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:21:09-05:00",
        "from": "person_sam_williams",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product ‚Äì find a 45-min slot next week",
        "body": "Hey both,\n\nFrom Alex‚Äôs options:\n- Tue 3/4: I‚Äôm clear until 15:30, but I‚Äôd rather not run directly into my 15:30‚Äì16:30 code review block. 10:00‚Äì10:45 or 11:30‚Äì12:15 would be fine. 15:00‚Äì15:45 is not great for me since it cuts too close.\n- Wed 3/5: I‚Äôve got standup 9:15‚Äì9:45 and an interview block 15:00‚Äì17:00. So 09:30‚Äì10:15 overlaps standup, but 16:00‚Äì16:45 doesn‚Äôt work either because I‚Äôm interviewing then.\n- Thu 3/6: 11:00‚Äì11:45 conflicts with an errand I need to run starting 11:30.\n\nSo for me the best slots are:\n1) Tue 3/4, 10:00‚Äì10:45\n2) Tue 3/4, 11:30‚Äì12:15\n\nIf neither of those works for everyone, we might have to look at a different day/slot.\n\n‚Äì Sam",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_alex_followup_slack",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "Thanks for the replies on email. Looks like:\n- Jordan: Wed 3/5 16:00‚Äì16:45 (pref #1), Tue 3/4 15:00‚Äì15:45 (pref #2)\n- Sam: Tue 3/4 10:00‚Äì10:45 or 11:30‚Äì12:15\n\nI‚Äôll scan our calendars again and see if there‚Äôs a 45-min slot next week that works for all three of us. May need to go outside the initial list I sent.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_alex_personal_scan_note",
        "channel": "internal_note",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:02:10-05:00",
        "author": "person_alex_smith",
        "content": "Looking for a 45-min slot next week (Mar 3‚Äì7) for planning with Jordan + Sam.\n\nCross-checking calendars:\n- Tue 3/4: \n  * Jordan busy 9:00‚Äì10:30, 11:00‚Äì12:00\n  * Sam wants to avoid 15:00‚Äì15:45 because of 15:30‚Äì16:30 code review block\n  * I have a 9:30‚Äì10:00 1:1 and 10:45‚Äì11:15 standup\n  => No contiguous 45-min where all are free.\n- Wed 3/5:\n  * Jordan busy 9:00‚Äì10:00 and 16:30‚Äì17:00\n  * Sam busy 9:15‚Äì9:45 and 15:00‚Äì17:00\n  * I‚Äôm busy 10:30‚Äì11:30\n  => 16:00‚Äì16:45 conflicts with Sam‚Äôs interview; mornings also overlap.\n- Thu 3/6:\n  * Jordan 10:30‚Äì11:30 appt\n  * Sam 11:30‚Äì13:00 errand\n  * I‚Äôm 9:00‚Äì10:00 Product Sync\n  => Possible 13:00‚Äì13:45 window; need to confirm.\n\nTentative: Thu 3/6, 13:00‚Äì13:45 ET looks open for all three. Will propose via email and then send calendar invite if they confirm.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_alex_email_proposed_slot",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:15:55-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product ‚Äì proposing Thu 3/6",
        "body": "Hi both,\n\nI looked a bit more broadly at our calendars next week.\n\nThe only 45-minute slot I can find that seems to work for all three of us, within working hours, is:\n- Thu 3/6, 13:00‚Äì13:45 ET\n\nCan you please confirm that this time works? If so, I‚Äôll send a calendar invite titled ‚ÄúMain Product ‚Äì Sprint Planning / Next Steps‚Äù and include a short agenda.\n\nBest,\nAlex",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_jordan_confirmation",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:24:03-05:00",
        "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product ‚Äì proposing Thu 3/6",
        "body": "Thu 3/6, 13:00‚Äì13:45 ET works for me.\n\nThanks for doing the calendar Tetris.\n\n‚Äì Jordan",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_sam_confirmation",
        "channel": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:28:47-05:00",
        "from": "person_sam_williams",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Re: Planning session for Main Product ‚Äì proposing Thu 3/6",
        "body": "Works for me as well. 13:00‚Äì13:45 ET on Thu 3/6 is free on my side.\n\n‚Äì Sam",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_calendar_invite_created",
        "channel": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:40:12-05:00",
        "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
        "participants": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "event": {
          "title": "Main Product ‚Äì Sprint Planning / Next Steps",
          "description": "45-minute planning meeting to discuss current progress on Main Product and align on next sprint goals and immediate next steps.\n\nProposed agenda:\n1) Review current sprint status\n2) Identify blockers and dependencies\n3) Agree on scope for next sprint\n4) Assign owners for follow-ups",
          "start": "2025-03-06T13:00:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-03-06T13:45:00-05:00",
          "location": "Zoom (link in invite)",
          "timezone": "America/New_York"
        },
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_planning_1_final_slack_note",
        "channel": "slack",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:42:33-05:00",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "message": "Invite sent for our Main Product planning: Thu 3/6, 1:00‚Äì1:45pm ET. Thanks for juggling calendars ‚Äì we‚Äôll use it to lock in next sprint goals and immediate next steps.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      }
    ]
  }
]

raw_message.content:
{
  "workspace_name": "Main Product Team",
  "channels": [
    {
      "id": "C001",
      "name": "proj-main-product"
    },
    {
      "id": "C002",
      "name": "general"
    },
    {
      "id": "C003",
      "name": "social-lunch"
    },
    {
      "id": "C004",
      "name": "it-support"
    }
  ],
  "users": [
    {
      "id": "U001",
      "name": "Alex Smith",
      "email": "alex.smith@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U002",
      "name": "Jordan Johnson",
      "email": "jordan.johnson@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U003",
      "name": "Sam Williams",
      "email": "sam.williams@company.com"
    },
    {
      "id": "U004",
      "name": "Taylor Brown",
      "email": "taylor.brown@company.com"
    }
  ],
  "messages": [
    {
      "id": "M001",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Anyone up for a team lunch next Wednesday? Thinking of trying that new Thai place on 5th.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-19T11:03:45-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M002",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "I‚Äôm in as long as we keep it between 12 and 1 so I can get back for an interview at 1:30.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-19T11:06:02-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-19T11:03:45-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M003",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Thai on 5th sounds great. I‚Äôll throw a calendar hold on everyone for 12‚Äì1 next Wed so we don‚Äôt forget.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-19T11:08:40-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-19T11:03:45-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M004",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Count me in, as long as nothing on fire lands that morning. Thanks for organizing, Taylor.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-19T11:11:12-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-19T11:03:45-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M005",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "PSA: I just sent calendar invites for a casual team lunch next Wed (Thai Street on 5th). Decline if you can‚Äôt make it, no pressure.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-19T11:22:01-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M006",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Anyone else seeing their MacBook fan going crazy lately? Mine‚Äôs been spinning up with just a browser + VS Code.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-20T13:58:03-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M007",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Mine‚Äôs fine, but IT has mentioned a couple of similar tickets. Might be worth filing one so they can track it.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-20T14:00:19-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-20T13:58:03-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M008",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Yeah, I‚Äôll open a ticket. If they find anything interesting I‚Äôll share here.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-20T14:03:15-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-20T13:58:03-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M009",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "FYI, I just got pulled into a P2 support issue about login errors after password reset (CS-8217). I‚Äôll be poking around auth for a bit this afternoon.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-21T14:10:03-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M010",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Thanks for the heads-up. I‚Äôll keep an eye on the auth logs; if anything weird pops up I‚Äôll DM you and we can dig in together.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-21T14:16:32-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-21T14:10:03-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M011",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Alex, when you have a sec, can you skim the updated onboarding doc for Product/Design? I added a section about how we hand off specs to Engineering.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-21T09:18:22-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M012",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "I‚Äôm putting together notes for the 2.3.1 patch release. Can you each DM me a quick bullet list of anything user-visible that went out in your areas over the last 2 weeks?",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-22T13:15:09-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M013",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "- Improved error handling for payment failures\n- Added logging around signup funnel\n- Fixed bug where profile pictures sometimes didn‚Äôt load on slow connections",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-22T13:19:51-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-22T13:15:09-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M014",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "I‚Äôll send mine in a bit once I finish cleaning up this branch. Mostly small UX tweaks and some accessibility fixes.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-22T13:23:04-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-22T13:15:09-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M015",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Heads up: HR sent around the annual Security Awareness Training reminder this morning. It‚Äôs ~45 mins; deadline is March 15. Might be worth blocking time on your calendars.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-17T09:02:10-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M016",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Thanks for the nudge. I‚Äôll try to knock it out one afternoon next week between meetings.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-17T09:05:44-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-17T09:02:10-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M017",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Alex, I just emailed you a new iteration of the onboarding flow designs and tossed a couple of tentative holds on your calendar next Tues/Wed morning for a review. We can move them around if your schedule shifts.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-18T16:18:10-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M018",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Got it, thanks. I‚Äôll take a first pass through the Figma file before our review so we can use the time to focus on tradeoffs.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-18T16:23:37-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-18T16:18:10-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M019",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Hey Jordan, Sam ‚Äì we need to get a planning session on the books for Main Product to go over current progress and next steps for the upcoming sprint. Looking at next week, sometime Mon‚ÄìThu during the day. I‚Äôll propose a few options over email so we can check calendars more easily.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:12:34-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M020",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "üëç sounds good. Next week is already starting to look like calendar Tetris, so email might be easier to sort it out.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:14:48-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T10:12:34-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M021",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Works for me. If you can avoid super late afternoons I‚Äôd appreciate it, but I‚Äôll mark anything that‚Äôs a hard conflict in my reply.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T10:16:03-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T10:12:34-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M022",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Thanks for the replies on email. Looks like:\n- Jordan: Wed 3/5 16:00‚Äì16:45 (pref #1), Tue 3/4 15:00‚Äì15:45 (pref #2)\n- Sam: Tue 3/4 10:00‚Äì10:45 or 11:30‚Äì12:15\n\nI‚Äôll scan our calendars again and see if there‚Äôs a 45-min slot next week that works for all three of us. May need to go outside the initial list I sent.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M023",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Appreciate you doing the cross-check, Alex. If we have to land on something that‚Äôs nobody‚Äôs first choice but works for everyone, that‚Äôs fine with me.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:48:12-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M024",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Same here. Feel free to go beyond the original list if that‚Äôs what it takes to get a full 45-min block with all three of us.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:50:27-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M025",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Quick note: based on a first pass at our calendars, Tue/Wed are looking pretty rough for a solid 45 mins when all three of us are free. I‚Äôm going to check Thursday a bit more carefully and see if there‚Äôs a midday slot we all share.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T11:59:41-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M026",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Thursday midday might actually be better for me than late afternoon earlier in the week, especially if we want some breathing room before/after.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:04:55-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M027",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Same, as long as it doesn‚Äôt overlap my late-morning appointment. Anything early afternoon on Thu is likely fine.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:07:18-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T11:45:31-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M028",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Invite sent for our Main Product planning: Thu 3/6, 1:00‚Äì1:45pm ET. Thanks for juggling calendars ‚Äì we‚Äôll use it to lock in next sprint goals and immediate next steps.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:42:33-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M029",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Got it, thanks. I‚Äôll come prepared with a quick rundown of open backend items and any infra dependencies for next sprint.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:44:01-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T12:42:33-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M030",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Accepted. I‚Äôll bring an updated view of what‚Äôs realistic from an implementation standpoint so we can be concrete about scope.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T12:46:22-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T12:42:33-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M031",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Sam, I just sent you an email about doing a short self-review ahead of our performance check-in next month. No rush, just by end of next week.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-23T09:07:42-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M032",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Saw it, thanks. I‚Äôll carve out some time later this week to jot a few bullets down.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-23T09:11:05-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-23T09:07:42-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M033",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Random question for the lunch crew: anyone tried the new veggie dumplings at Thai Street? Debating between that and the pad see ew for next week.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T09:55:12-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M034",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Pad see ew is solid. Haven‚Äôt tried the dumplings yet but the reviews looked good when I checked last night.",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T09:58:03-05:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-02-24T09:55:12-05:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M035",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Since we have the planning session locked for next Thu, do we still want to keep the smaller feature-grooming chat we had penciled in for Wed, or fold that into the 45-min block?",
      "timestamp": "2025-02-24T13:02:17-05:00"
    },
    {
